snippet.title: LAPIN game Early Access Release Trailer | 2022.11.17
snippet.description:
#lapin #platformer #earlyaccess #indiegame #studiodoodal #games 
An adventure of brave rabbits, LAPIN!
LAPIN is a 2D platformer game featuring a group of brave rabbit explorers. Five rabbits used to live under a park, but construction forced them to leave their beloved hole. Players need to help Liebe and her friends to explore the world with precise control. Meet new friends, remember past events, and hop on to the end of the adventure!

🐰 LAPIN steam page : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1454540/Lapin/
🎮 twitter : @StudioDoodal

Studio Doodal is an indie game studio based in seoul.
We believe the power of imagination and story.
